short_description: Master Python basics including data types functions and OOP. Build a solid foundation for backend development.
Learn Django from scratch - models views templates and forms. Build your first web application.
Build production-ready REST APIs using Django REST Framework. Learn serializers viewsets and authentication.
Deep dive into Django ORM - complex queries relationships and optimization techniques.
Master object-oriented programming and common design patterns used in real projects.
Implement JWT OAuth2 and token-based authentication. Secure your APIs against common vulnerabilities.
Learn database optimization caching deployment and monitoring for production systems.
Comprehensive course covering Python Django REST APIs and production deployment.
job_roles: Backend Developer Intern|Junior Backend Developer|API Developer

short_description: Master middleware signals custom commands and async views in Django.
Learn database design normalization indexing and query optimization for high-performance backends.
